name: Multi Card Keno
description:
Multi-Card Keno is here, an exciting variation of Casino Video Keno with the ability of playing up to 20 cards at once for the ultimate jackpot payouts.

Similar to the Casino version with the same odds and payouts, Multi Card Keno is a simple game to understand, as it works like a lottery; pick a card, place a bet and mark 2-10 numbers. Now…choose another card and pick more numbers or alternatively play a single card all the way up to 20 cards at once. Press Start and 20 numbers are randomly selected out of 80. If you hit enough numbers you win, and if the draw pays on multiple cards you have supreme paybacks!

While maintaining the familiarity with the casino game, our iteration has several extras; Soft background music, sweet sound effects, vibrantly clean graphics, multi-denomination and a scrolling stats tracker.

Multi Card Keno gives you unlimited play with unlimited credits! If you are low on credits, the game will automatically give you more! A great feature for you Keno fans! No waiting, no purchasing, automatic!

Multi-Card Keno is a pay once application. For only $1.99 you get the full game and all updates that come down the pike for free. There are no bothersome ads or crazy endless in-app purchases.
